== LinuxAdda ==

==== Definition ====
LinuxAdda ( or লিনাক্সাড্ডা in <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bengali_language|Bangla]]</nowiki>) is a casual meet-up of the Linux Fans in Bangladesh. 

==== Organizer ====
Bangladesh Linux Users' Alliance.

==== Places ====
Till now all the meet up held in Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh

==== Frequency ====
There is no strict time schedule for this event. It is organized whenever the fans get free time to spend together.
